title: Donate to Orbital Tɛmpl
heading: Kɔmplit Yu Doneshɔn
chooseHow: Pik aw yu go want fɔ dɔn yu doneshɔn we yu nɔ go pe taks:

option1.heading: Opshɔn 1: Gi Don na di Intanɛt Naw
option1.description: Kɔmplit yu doneshɔn wantɛm wantɛm yuz kredit kad, dɛbit kad, ɔ ɔda we dɛn fɔ pe na di Intanɛt tru wi sikrit fiskal spɔnsɔ, The Field . Yu go gɛt wan taks risit wantɛm wantɛm.

option2.heading: Opshɔn 2: Bank Dipɔsit to Di Roy Fɔdayshɔn
option2.description: Mek dairekt bank dipɔsit ɔ waya transfa to The Roy Foundation , wi stratejik patna ɛn fiskal spɔnsɔ. Dis opshɔn fayn fɔ big doneshɔn ɔ intanashɔnal transfa.
option2.instructions: Duya put " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " na di rɛfrɛns fil. Afta yu dɔn dɔn yu transfa, imel wi na sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art wit yu transfa ditil fɔ gɛt yu taks risit.

taxInfo.heading: Giv we dɛn kin pul pan taks
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple na wan fiskal spɔnsɔ projɛkt fɔ The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , we na 501(c)(3) ɔganayzeshɔn we nɔ de du biznɛs. Ɔl di kɔntribyushɔn dɛn we di Amɛrika kin gi, dɛn kin pul dɛn taks te to di mak we di lɔ alaw.
